CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Ballista Bolt
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A steel tip attached to a long and fletched wooden pole, packing a very strong punch against scarcely armored targets.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Heavy Ballista Bolt
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Fitted with a heavy steel tip to defeat the toughest of targets.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Armor-Piercing Ballista Bolt
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Fitted with a streamlined and hardened steel tip to punch through armored targets.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: stone crossbow bolt
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A sharpened stone is attached to a wooden shaft. Cuts exposed tissue fairly well but isn't very effective against armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: steel crossbow bolt
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The head of the crossbow bolt is made from steel to enhance armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: plasteel crossbow bolt
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The head of the crossbow bolt is made from plasteel to maximize armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: lead ball
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A smooth projectile made of soft metal, usually fired from a smoothbore weapon.
